lines.text: Aye, laddie, it's your dough, but it's your war too!

[to Donald Duck, making "curvaceous woman" sign with his hands]
I've got some good dates for us.

[to Donald Duck, pointing to due dates for income tax payments on flip calendar]
But laddie, I've got some *better* dates!
Just remember, every dollar you spend for something you don't need is a dollar spent to help the Axis. But every dollar you sock away for taxes is another dollar to help *sock* the Axis.
